level.heading: Establishment by subdivision.
level.text: Whenever the owners or the co-owners of any square or lot shall subdivide the same into a condominium project in conformity with § 42-2009 with a plat of condominium subdivision there shall be established a horizontal property regime.

level.heading: Cross References
